website_summaries.verdict: Choose this office chair if your budget is your top concern and you don't mind the possibility of several issues arising.
pros: Very affordable and straightforward to assemble
Doesn't take up a lot of space so it's great for small offices
Can be used with or without the arm rests
cons: A few longevity and durability concerns, as some of the components have been reported to break

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The back of the chair broke clean off after 8 weeks of use. The break was in exactly the same place as one of the other reviews on this page, suggesting that there is a serious quality control issue. In view of the risk of injury a recall should be considered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value chair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this chair for a few weeks now. I am 17.5 stone and I can be on this chair for 4 or 5 hours at a time. It is comfortable and supports me well. great value.
customer_reviews.author: Trev-R

customer_reviews.title: Extremely flimsy potential health hazard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair a couple of months ago to have by my desk and the bleeding thing just snapped in half (the plastic back). I now have a bruise the size of a tennis ball on my lower spine where i fell with all my weight on the stump. Avoid like the plague as chair is incredably flimsy and will break at earliest opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W O J Holley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lumbar support, and the back literally broke clean off within 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says. This chair does not provide good back support at all, and there is absolutely no way of adjusting the angle or position of the back rest relative to the seat. It did not take long after purchase for the back to begin flexing further and further back when the user leans against the back rest. I purchased this less than 1 year ago. Today the back broke clean off. Picture attached shows the broken join where the back was attached to the seat. Awful, I would discourage anyone from even considering purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Budget Chair
customer_reviews.text: First of all, for the price tag this is an excellent chair. There are a few things that are worth mentioning though. The padding on the bottom is minimal and I have occassionally got quite sore. I like it's able to free float but it would have been nice to have an adjustable back rest something I didn't realise this has not got. Although it's not a big deal as I place a pillow under my lumber as I have back pains and I can work relatively pain free. Overall, if you're looking for a decent budget chair I'd reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, comfortable, easy to assemble and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price. Comfortable to sit in, easy assembly and looks nice too. Only real criticism is that the chair is uncomfortable if you sit too long and/or require good back support. The quality is excellent for the price though, no doubts there.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, comfortable and supportive. Update: 4 months later and I have to withdraw my positive review, the padding in the seat cushion does not adjust to your body as is too firm and therefore causes pain in thighs/upper legs. Buy something else! IKEA have a better range than Amazon and the quality is higher too.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Broke catastrophically after six months normal use.
customer_reviews.text: Broke catastrophically after six months normal use. The back broke off and I fell over backwards, lucky not to hit my head on something! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Snapped
customer_reviews.text: Not all the screws fitted in all the way. Always at risk when leaning back. Chair snapped 2 weeks into owning it. Very disappointed and would want a refund if possible. Very gutted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Back Swivel Desk Chair
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and only took me half hour to assemble, the instructions quite easy to follow. I find it comfortable and shouldn't get a numb bottom when sitting for long periods on the thick, cushioned seat, with good lower back support from the mesh back - so a sweaty back should also be a thing of the past in hot weather. I'm so far very pleased with the chair and hope to get many years use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Buckland

customer_reviews.title: Back broke off
customer_reviews.text: As a number of reviews have said the back of the chair broke off exactly as shown in photos in other reviews. Incredibly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Keay

customer_reviews.title: A good value for money chair
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a lot of money to spend on this and opted for this one having read the reviews. I'm very pleased with it having had it around 4 months now and think it was a good buy for the cost. It was easy to put together and fairly comfortable, although I never find sitting at a pc completely comfortable anyway. I also purchased a swivel foot rest and a memory foam back support pad too which have all helped to create a better sitting position. My only small gripe is that I slide forward a bit on the seat of the chair. I've put a cotton hand towel on it which seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy chair which is reasonably easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy chair which is reasonably easy to assemble. Badly let down by poor assembly instructions. Pictorial instructions are not as good as simple English instructions.
customer_reviews.author: cephas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this chair I was concerned there may be some complicated assembly involved. I couldn't have been more wrong. All the parts were clearly labelled, including fixings. The screws and washers were even separated in the packaging to avoid any confusion. The step-by-step assembly guide could not have been clearer or simpler to follow. It took less than 30 mins to put this chair together. My only feedback would be regarding the chair arms. If they were adjustable, rather than fixed, I would have been happy to give this chair 5 stars across the board. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W from Durham

customer_reviews.title: comfortable with good back support
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived very quickly, well packaged. It was easy to put together, just make sure all the pieces are laid out and the different sized bolts sorted out. It took me about 20 minutes to assemble. When assembled it seems sturdy, the seat is comfortable and my back is well supported so I can sit comfortably for long periods. I find the arm rests not much use as too low to rest my arms on but that is a minor matter. So far I am pleased with the chair and hope I continue to be so.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Office Essentials Mesh Back Swivel Desk Chair
customer_reviews.text: The back support snapped after just 2 weeks. It's an OK chair for the price if you don't lean too much, but if you like me slouch in the chair and put most of your weight to the back support it's not going to last. I wish they had made that bit from steel instead of tough plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Goonman

customer_reviews.title: Broken chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair initially seemed ok and then it started bending backwards.. after 3 months the back support broke entirely and I am left with a wreckage
customer_reviews.author: Punit

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster
customer_reviews.text: Chair is decent and will probably last for a while but I'm not overly fond of it. Really limited adjustment (can't move arm rests so they're stuck in an uncomfortable position, can't tilt, etc). It's reasonably comfortable for long periods and seems strong/durable but I'd personally invest in something more expensive with better adjustment options The back of this chair is also pretty short so it doesn't support you that well.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: incomplete washers
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the item which arrived early, Would have been 5 stars if I had had all the washers. Missing 15 washers and 14 spring washers. Contacted the phone number on the instruction leaflet and was told to contact Amazon. I have partially assembled the office chair so I could not return it(especially as I am disabled) Unfortunately I had to explain and describe to the voice at the other end of the phone line what a washer was! Am about to purchase the required items on line but not sure of the screw size
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Entry level short term use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a basic height adjustable computer chair, however back support not as great also the arm rest cannot be adjusted to Match desk level for extra comfort. If you require a chair for a long period of use I recommend looking for the below 1 Height adjustable 2 Arm rest adjustable 3 Higher back support to the neck 4 breathing cloth with adequate padding Overall a decent buy 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Adequate chair but not for any length of time
customer_reviews.text: Chair appears robust and relatively comfortable, however if (as I have over lockdown) one sits for any length of time, I find it does not have neough padding on the seat nor back support (it has a non-adjustable lumbar support). But as it was also reasonably priced, I did not expect miracles. Probably worth spending a bit more to get better cushioning and lumbar support, if sitting for a length of time
customer_reviews.author: simpal

customer_reviews.title: you have to build it yourself with no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: it came in a box. 8 pieces. plus 14 screws and 28 washer type things. NO INSTRUCTIONS I dont have a screwdriver in the house and i cant go out to get one. Even if i could there are no instructions on how to put it together so its back in the box. i cant even return it because i cant go out as am sheltering. i think they should have made it clear when purchasing that you had to build it yourself. i have tried and cannot do it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D K A Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Don't but if you like to relax on a chair.
customer_reviews.text: was okay for first 3 weeks but then it snapped and caused some awful swelling on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Conner Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable work chair, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new swivel chair to go against a rather high work bench in my study where my late wife used to sew. This fitted the bill perfectly as it rises enough for me to sit against the work surface at normal level. Took less than ten minutes to unpack and assemble and appears to be quite sturdy, certainly better than some much more expensive versions I have bought in the past. Comfortable in use over long periods and the castors roll easily and without marking on a thick carpet. Good value for money Very pleased with purchase would recommend
customer_reviews.author: BlackBrigand

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but you pay the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable seat but not very durable. Arm rests are very low and basically useless in terms of comfort. Mesh back is a nice addition and comfortable to lean back on. Recline is decent but its an all or nothing approach and cannot be fixed in a reclined position. For the money it is what you would expect from a chair. In addition one arm rest snapped of during normal use, highlighting certain durability issues. Not sure if I received a faulty unit or not.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair! I wanted something that would not take up too much space in my bedroom, where I have all my computer equipment . The chair was easy to assemble (although it was a bit tricky with the washer and screws for the seat), but it took no more than half an hour. The seat itself is comfortable, I feel supported with the back rest, I have quite long legs, so it can be adjusted up or down as needed. For the money this is a very economical chair!
customer_reviews.author: Queenfemi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Have just received this 3 days early, thankfully. My 5yr old abd I put it together in 15, max 20, mins. Super easy. Moves up and down easily, super smooth and sturdy. Back rest doesn't move as I expected and the arm rests are a little low but to be honest I couldn't be more delighted now I won't be sitting on an industrial kitchen chair anymore working from home. Excellent quality for the price. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Bargain
customer_reviews.text: A Year ago I bought a leather one like this with a price tag of 146 pounds from a retail outlet. After one month returned it as it was hard to assemble in the first place it did not give me the support promised and was extremely clumsy. I then decided to look further and found this one. Now, I am disabled and wow it was a brilliant find.It gives great support easy to assemble (4mins) very comfortable with brilliant price tag. I am over the moon with this chair. G.P.W.
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Wiles

customer_reviews.title: V comfortable and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Got the chair today. Assembly was very simple and quick. At first I thought the seat felt hard, but once we put it together and I sat on it I realised it’s very comfortable. It does come with everything you need to assemble including an Allen key. I did want a chair that could tilt back, and this chair does that to an extent, which is good, but you can’t lock it on a tilt which is unfortunate. Overall first impressions are very good! Updates to follow in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Chair itself fine but came without armrests.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault the chair, bought it for my 9yo son and he loves it. But it came without the armrests. Amazon wanted it to be returned rather than just getting the manufacturer to send the replacement armrests and to be honest that was too much hassle as the packaging was ripped and it is so big, so I just kept it without them.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this chair as I had been using a dining chair as my office chair. It’s so easy to put together I didn’t have to ask for help! It’s sturdy enough and the seat is deep and firm without being too hard. It’s definitely made sitting for long hours easier and more comfortable. And you can chose to leave off the arms which I have done as I don’t use them
customer_reviews.author: Leona Connnor

customer_reviews.title: Back broke off
customer_reviews.text: Back broke off like all the other reviews stating that . I didn’t believe them untill it happened to me... I do not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for a great price. I suffer with back pain and this helps by supporting my back in the right places. I like the fact it doesn't flex/tips back so you can push yourself right back into the supports. It tilts forward slightly to give you the correct posture. The chair is generally comfortable and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben22

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This seat was delivered in a kit that was relatively easy to put together. All the parts seemed solid and well made and my wife is very happy with the comfort it provides. We have only had it for a few weeks but from what I have seen so far it appears to be very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: GF Sussex

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This desk chair was exactly what I wanted. I had to assemble it myself, and I'm old and full of arthritis, but by following the instructions I was able to do it by myself, and I'm very pleased with it. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Burtie43

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my home office and generally very happy, although a couple of the rear back support bolts keep coming loose for some reason! (YES the correct bolts were used in assembly). Very comfortable and I like the tilt mechanism, although it does feel a little unstable at times. Good value for money though.
customer_reviews.author: PE@BD17

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to amazon, we bought this chair at the beginning of the lockdown. Easy to assemble, the chair is very confortable despite being used every working day for the past 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Erailo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair, wasn't new and was very dusty
customer_reviews.text: When the chair arrived the back was incredibly dusty. Cleaning out the back of the chair from dust filled a large proportion of a dust pan. Very disappointing considering the chair was being sold as "new". It had definitely been unwrapped before and left out for a while. Some of the inside boxes containing the small parts also looked battered like they had been previously opened. Once you had cleaned the chair however it was quite easy to put together and is comfortable. Casters aren't great but do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not support your back
customer_reviews.text: Does not support your back, the back rest goes back too far. I have had used a backrest and car back rest, still too far away and no support. Bum becomes numb and sore after a while. Not good for home working. The positive is, this was delivered quick,
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened with delivery
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok, basic but good enough for working from home, The delivery was a complete mess, for some reason ups delivery to a parcel shop and not my address. When I collected the item the box was badly damaged
customer_reviews.author: Darren C

customer_reviews.title: Back Snapped Off! Dangerous, avoid!!
customer_reviews.text: I was *gently* leaning back on this item, having owned it about 4 months, and the back snapped clean off - photo attached. Extremely dangerous and I nearly fell completely off them item as it'd been completely unexpected. Could have ended far worse - AVOID!!
customer_reviews.author: Scrat134

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable office chair, I use it when sat at my sewing machine, it's supportive, high quality and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent office chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my home office during the Covid pandemic. It was the only chair that was still available when the lockdown started. I did not expect much and was pleasantly surprised. For 40 pounds it is an amazing chair and indistinguishable from other much more expensive chairs in my actual office.
customer_reviews.author: Hektor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair for working from home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product having been working from home since March, it’s easy to assemble, very comfortable. It’s light weight therefore easy to carry up and down stairs when I ‘take down’ my office at weekend and doesn’t dent the carpet. It was a recommendation from a friend who also purchased the item .
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne319

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early and was pretty simple to assemble, the cost was really good tbh and it’s sturdy and comfortable. Was concerned with some of the reviews but glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Gary Norman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are comfortabe. The correct size for pushing under a desk and really good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair apart from ...
customer_reviews.text: The only negative point is the arms of the chair are not adjustable and they are too low for me so had to remove them. It would have been a perfect chair apart from this.
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am very pleased with this chair. Easy to construct. Light-weight yet robust enough for home use. Comfortable and easy to adjust. Does not take up too much room and arms fit under my pull out keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good value and a decent office chair
customer_reviews.text: Got it for great value at the time, easy enough assembly, I've tightened the screws twice with the allen key since I initially put it together. I'd maybe recommend checking the tightness of the screws monthly to ensure they aren't loosening with normal use. Comfortable chair and does the job
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good office chair excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely chair has saved my life whilst working from home. Good padded seat and light and easy to move around. Great value for money. One of the 4 screws under the seat base would not fully screw in but it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ali G

customer_reviews.title: Fast construction. Comfort matches the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great chair. Easy to put together. The support is fine. The only issue is the seating which is fine but not the most comfortable. Again what I'd expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Of Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my University going son. Takes up less space in the room than his last one; is very light weight and comfortable to sit on, all day long.Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: artiC

customer_reviews.title: Going up in the world :)
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. It was a doddle to assemble and I feel the benefits already - many thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Crean

customer_reviews.title: Replaced and is a really good chair
customer_reviews.text: I had to request a replacement as pretty soon after purchasing the webbing on the back rest was coming away , no problems with replacement
customer_reviews.author: peter kewley

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I spend a good part of my day in this chair, and it is very comfortable for a 6ft 13.5stone chap. Also, easy to assemble and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant!! Excellent value, very sturdy and delivery was quicker than expected, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Robust and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Looks great, easy to assemble. Very comfortable, great height adjustment and good adjustable back rest. Free running castor wheels. Ideal height of armrests.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Howarth

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 4 years now and its still in really good shape. Has an adjustable height and lockable leaning back lever which is nice. I use it without any arm rests as it fits under my desk easier. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ollie B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: A good day to day computer chair. Easy to put together and it seems to be fairly stable and robust. Height adjustment is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A very happy little boy
customer_reviews.text: It was a present for a Grandson to go with a desk his parents bought him, he is over the moon with it. He says he feels very important sitting at his desk -- he is ten years old!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anatomy

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble, but falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've not had this chair for a month yet, but some staples fell out where a plastic pipe seems to be holding a tube in around the mesh. In my attempt to remove a staple that was hanging out by a point, I also pricked my thumb. I didn't believe the reviews that were one star. I assumed they were just people who didn't assemble it properly. But this is a part which comes pre-assembled, which means that the overall build quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Skye S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a seat that could raise me higher to align with my screen. Perfect!! You can leave the arms off if you want
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couple of M6 x 35 Bolts are missing from the order so unable to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this chair but it comes with 8 (M6 x 35) mm bolts but the chair assembly will require 10 such bolts. Due to this missing parts I'm unable to assemble the chair . There is no support available for this product as the number provided is unreachable. Please help me to get my money back or provide the missing bolts without those this chair is not assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Sumit Verma

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I just needed an extra office chair nice and basic but with arms, the arms are really low so basically pointless on this lol but others good value easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Chair back snapped off on my pregnant wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife was sitting on the chair when she fell back as the plastic support of the chair back gave way. Absolutely outrages and speaking to our solicitor
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pygram

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as im working from home and needed a proper comfortable chair. Very impressed with the product and a very quick delivery service especially with the COVID situation we are all in..👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Akbar Makda

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but strong.
customer_reviews.text: A really good chair for the money. Comfortable and easily altered to suit different heights etc. I have not used the arms so it fits easily under the desk. It is very light and mobile, a ‘stop’ on the wheels might be useful but overall this is a good, strong chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tipsymillers

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble very comfortable fits nicely under my desk. I'm short so was worried it wouldn't go low enough but is geeat
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair for Home Office
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, easy to build, comfortable for a good few hours at a time. Thank you great chair to set up Home Office quickly on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with some part of it broken, although the box itself was not damaged. The tilting mechanism doesn't work either. All in all, I do not recommend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolett Jozsika

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Worst chair ever,deck chair is better than this would not recomend
customer_reviews.author: chooch

customer_reviews.title: Office essential black mesh
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Prise wise is ok. Assembly is easy. Missing small washer and dysfunctional allan key are the dawn side.
customer_reviews.author: Nad

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Easy to assemble and simple to adjust up and down. Perfect fit in my little office
customer_reviews.author: Karima

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday...easy to assemble...cant believe how comfortable it is...why didn't I buy one before instead of an old chair and two cushions
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. B. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Recommended budget buy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is excellent for the money. I use a cushion at my back but that is because I am under five feet tall do need to sit forward in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Not worth at all for the money you spend .Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It’s not worth at all for the money you put according to the hard labour to assemble it .Non proper instruction and u struggle like anything to assemble as it is cheap design for the tools ,u must need another one to support you ...👎
customer_reviews.author: Anosh Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for adults
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Back rest too low. Arm rests are too low. When you lean back it tilts slightly to the right. So not suitable for an adult. Ok for children.
customer_reviews.author: machinecode

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok but even though I am a regular weight person, after a month of purchase it started squeaking so loud that it's now impossible to sit on it, as it keeps making annoying noises each time you move a single muscle. I am not sure if this is something the manufacturer can fix, but I would not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble ,good instructions except I would leave the arms until last to fix to seat.
customer_reviews.author: dennis morgan

customer_reviews.title: Ok chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son in university digs. Easy to assemble and looks good. Seems quite robust. Provides adequate support and can be adjusted to fit. Ok chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is my chair for sitting on to use my computer and its fine,was easy for me on my own to put together no problem, can recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ann Jones

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: For a very inexpensive chair it’s incredibly comfortable. Easy to assemble. The back doesn’t adjust but for the price it’s still a good buy. Arrived well before the estimated date. A good buy to see you through working from home during lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: Calli Newnham

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner as working from home. He loves it. Easy to assemble and seem well made
customer_reviews.author: Joanne ford

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fault.
customer_reviews.text: In our sons bedroom - comfortable and has taken a hell of a lot of use over the past 2 months. So far so good. Great quality for the price paid
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair is fine but have found it hard to keep clean as particles get stuck in seat part
customer_reviews.author: graham baker

customer_reviews.title: Good value chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good chair for the money. The only reason I didn't give five stars is that, (unlike a smilar one I bought on Amazon some time early for same sort of money), this one has no 'give' in the back.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: It is fine for working from home
customer_reviews.text: I received quickly. It is easy to put together and comfortable enough for work, and it has a good price.
customer_reviews.author: pdemedina

customer_reviews.title: Great office chair. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very comfortable and fits under my chespo IKEA desk with arms on!
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Heiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an office project, the assembly took a while (literally down to nuts and bolts) but the resulting chairs were sturdy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: WrenPat

customer_reviews.title: item broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Hi i ordered this product in Jan and its March and through my usage of the chair its been falling apart even though i tighten the screws frequently, im a uni student and i cant afford to keep buying chairs, the back board snapped in half when laid back slightly. id like a replacement or even just the back board to get replaced as i cant afford to get a new one , thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elber Andres Arenas Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair so that I had a desk chair to use whilst working from home due to COVID. It was never comfortable but it did the job. Fast forward 3 months and the back snaps. I would highly recommend avoiding this product and spending a little more on decent chair that won't fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good value and comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: Really good value and comfortable chair. Good material, good quality, good price. I think this is better than a lot 100+ priced chairs on the market.
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: As a chair for a home office that is not used regularly for any length of time, this chair is very good value for money. Delivered promptly relatively easy to assemble. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rosybank

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable seat. Arrived on the date stated. Was well packed. Easy to assemble Clear instructions in English.
customer_reviews.author: shorty

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negatives, Fantastic chair
customer_reviews.text: What a comfortable back friendly chair. I have back problems and this is COMFEEE
customer_reviews.author: biggi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about quality given the price but the chair is sturdy, comfortable and perfect t for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: It is quite awkward and would be easier for someone with 3 hands!
customer_reviews.text: Very good chair-only gave it 4stars for assembly because of its size made it cumbersome!
customer_reviews.author: GREY-SURFER

customer_reviews.title: Very good value fore money
customer_reviews.text: Quite easy to assemble and very comfortable. I use it at my home desk office and it is very comfortable and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Queralt

customer_reviews.title: Good chair.
customer_reviews.text: Really good, comfortable chair. Easy to assemble. Sometimes the height adjustment gradually gets lower by itself.

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, neat to look at and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie B

product_meta.title: Office Essentials Mesh Back Swivel Desk Chair with Torsion Control, Black
product_meta.description: A stylish mesh office chair with cushioned seat with supportive mesh back. The lock tilt mechanism allows for seat height adjustment and the tilt of the chair can be locked or set to free float with the user.
feature_bullets: Ergonomically designed mesh back swivel desk chair featuring a well cushioned seat and supportive breathable mesh back
Adjustable seat height with high-quality gas lift for a more robust chair

The tilt of the chair can be locked or set to free float with the user for the most comfortable sitting position. An added feature which is not present in many similar chairs is a TORSION CONTROL knob, this means that the user can adjust the tension of the free floating tilt to match their body weight
BIFMA quality arms for added comfort
Dimensions: Seat height 44 to 56 cm, seat depth 47 cm, seat width 48 cm, back width 51 cm, arm height 56.5 to 68.5 cm with total chair height of 87 to 99 cm and width of 60.5 cm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars561 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
